Title: Repeals the portion of the criminal procedure law dealing with discovery and the ability for a defendant to request access to a crime scene or other relevant premises
Summary: Repeals provisions dealing with discovery and the ability for a defendant to request access to a crime scene or other relevant premises.
LawCode: Rpld ยง245.30 sub 2, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 2 of section 245.30 of the criminal procedure law relating to court orders to grant a defendant access to a crime scene or other relevant premises
